result.description:
Returns Data visualization API results for the table data source. Supports single data source.
For simple visualizations, do not set Trend by field and Group by field.
For group visualizations, set the Group by field and do not set Trend by field.
For trend visualizations, set the Trend by field, also can set Group by field (Only one group is supported.)
result.sys_name: Data Visualization API for table data source
result.api_name: global.Data Visualization API for table data source
result.name: Data Visualization API for table data source

result.description: Take certification action (certify, fail) on selected records
result.props:
[ 
  {
     "name": "taskId",
     "label": "Task ID",
     "description": "Sys id of the task record",
     "readOnly": false,
     "fieldType": "string",
     "mandatory": true,
     "defaultValue": ""
   },
  {
     "name": "selectProps",
     "label": "List Selection Props",
     "description": "Object containing the current list selection props",
     "readOnly": false,
     "fieldType": "object",
     "mandatory": true,
     "defaultValue": {}  
  },
  {
     "name": "attributes",
     "label": "Attributes",
     "description": "Array of attribute names to act on",
     "readOnly": false,
     "fieldType": "array",
     "mandatory": false,
     "defaultValue": []  
  },
  {
     "name": "action",
     "label": "Action",
     "description": "Type of action to perform (Certify, fail)",
     "readOnly": false,
     "fieldType": "choice",
     "valueType": "string",
     "mandatory": true,
     "defaultValue": "",
     "typeMetadata": {
         "choices": [{"label": "Certify", "value": "certify" },{"label": "Fail", "value": "fail" }]
     }
  },
  {
     "name": "comment",
     "label": "Comment",
     "description": "Comment about the action being performed",
     "readOnly": false,
     "fieldType": "string",
     "mandatory": false,
     "defaultValue": ""
   }
]
result.name: Perform certification action

result.description: Returns Data visualization API results for the metricbase data source. Supports single data source and only trend visualization.
result.sys_name: Data Visualization API for metricbase data source
result.props:
[
  {
    "name": "table",
    "label": "Metric",
    "description": "Metric to use as data source",
    "readOnly": false,
    "fieldType": "table_name",
    "mandatory": true,
    "defaultValue": "mb_demo_drone"
  },
  {
    "name": "filterQuery",
    "label": "Data source condition",
    "description": "The query conditions used for table data source",
    "readOnly": false,
    "fieldType": "condition_string",
    "mandatory": false,
    "typeMetadata": {
      "table": "@table"
    },
    "defaultValue": "nameLIKEasf"
  },
  {
    "name": "transforms",
    "label": "Metric transform",
    "description": "Metric transform. Required for trend visualizations.",
    "readOnly": false,
    "fieldType": "json",
    "mandatory": false,
    "defaultValue": "[{\"metric\":\"mb_demo_mt_external_temperature\",\"transform\":{\"transform\":\"Reference\",\"name\":\"chart-subjects\"}}]"
  },
  {
    "name": "groupBy",
    "label": "Group by",
    "description": "Group results by. Optional for trend visualizations and supports only one group.",
    "readOnly": false,
    "fieldType": "json",
    "mandatory": false,
    "defaultValue": ["fleet"]
  },
  {
    "name": "startTime",
    "label": "Date range start",
    "description": "Start of date range. Can be defined as period(such as P7D) or absolute time.",
    "readOnly": false,
    "fieldType": "date",
    "mandatory": false,
    "defaultValue": "P7D"
  },
  {
    "name": "endTime",
    "label": "Date range end",
    "description": "End of date range. Required when the start time is defined as absolute time.",
    "readOnly": false,
    "fieldType": "date",
    "mandatory": false,
    "defaultValue": "2022-04-07T16:55:26.322Z"
  },
  {
    "name": "filterConfigurations",
    "label": "Filter configurations",
    "description": "Bind this to @state.parFilters to make the data resource react to filters on the page.",
    "readOnly": false,
    "fieldType": "json",
    "mandatory": false,
    "defaultValue": []
  }
]
result.api_name: global.Data Visualization API for metricbase data source
result.name: Data Visualization API for metricbase data source

result.description: Calls the REST with METHOD: POST API: /api/sn_sow_on_call/on_call_shifts/oncallgroups
result.props:
[
	{
		"name": "date_time",
		"label": "Date Time",
		"description": "A date and time for which On-Call data should be retreived",
		"readOnly": false,
		"fieldType": "string",
		"mandatory": false,
		"defaultValue": ""
	},
	{
		"name": "sysparm_offset",
		"label": "Starting record index",
		"description": "Starting record index for which to begin retrieving records. Use this value to paginate record retrieval. For example, the first time you call this endpoint, sysparm_offset is set to 0. To simply page through all available records, use sysparm_offset=sysparm_offset+sysparm_limit, until you reach the end of all records.",
		"readOnly": false,
		"fieldType": "string",
		"mandatory": false,
		"defaultValue": ""
	},
	{
		"name": "sysparm_limit",
		"label": "Maximum number of records to return",
		"description": "Maximum number of records to return. For requests that exceed this number of records, use the sysparm_offset parameter to paginate record retrieval.",
		"readOnly": false,
		"fieldType": "string",
		"mandatory": false,
		"defaultValue": ""
	},
	{
		"name": "textSearch",
		"label": "Search by group name",
		"description": "String to use to search by group name",
		"readOnly": false,
		"fieldType": "string",
		"mandatory": false,
		"defaultValue": ""
	},
	{
		"name": "exclude_groups",
		"label": "Excluded groups",
		"description": "Sys ID of the groups to exclude",
		"readOnly": false,
		"fieldType": "string",
		"mandatory": false,
		"defaultValue": ""
	},
        {
		"name": "active_groups",
		"label": "Active groups",
		"description": "Show only active groups",
		"readOnly": false,
		"fieldType": "boolean",
		"mandatory": false,
		"defaultValue": false
	}
]
result.name: Who is on-call

result.description:
Returns Data visualization API results for the indicator data source. Supports a single data source.
For simple visualizations (eg. Single Score), do not set Group by field, and Trend by field should be set to disable.
For group visualizations (eg. Bar), set the Group by field(Only one group is supported.) and Trend by field should be set to disable.
For time series visualizations, set the Trend by to enable, also can set Group by field (Only one group is supported.)
The properties take the sys_id's of Performance Analytics objects as parameters. You can use the Copy Sys ID context action, or the PAScorecards API to get these sys_id values. See "Performance Analytics API Examples" in the product documentation.
result.sys_name: Data Visualization API for indicator data source
result.api_name: global.Data Visualization API for indicator data source
result.name: Data Visualization API for indicator data source

result.description: Take attestation action (attest, reject, unattest, remove duplicate) on selected CIs
result.sys_name: Perform selected action for selected CI
result.props:
[{
 "name": "sysIds",
  "label": "Selected sysIds of task-to-ci records",
  "description": "CI Sys IDs",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "string",
  "mandatory": false
},
{
 "name": "action",
  "label": "Action",
  "description": "This field informs if the action is to attest, unattest or reject CIs",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "choice",
  "valueType": "string",
  "mandatory": false,
  "defaultValue": "attest",
  "typeMetadata": {
        "choices": [{"label": "Attest", "value": "attest" },{"label": "Reject", "value": "reject" },{"label": "Unattest", "value": "unattest" },{"label": "Duplicate", "value": "duplicate" },{"label": "Exclude", "value": "exclude" }]
  }
},
{
 "name": "userComment",
  "label": "User Comment",
  "description": "Comment provided by user to add context to action",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "string",
  "mandatory": false
},
{
 "name": "taskSysId",
  "label": "Task SysId",
  "description": "Task SysId",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "string",
  "mandatory": false
},
{
 "name": "allRecordsSelected",
  "label": "allRecordsSelected",
  "description": "Indicates whether all rows on the list were selected",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "boolean",
  "mandatory": false
},
{
 "name": "currentAttestationStatus",
  "label": "currentAttestationStatus",
  "description": "Attestation status of the current tab",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "string",
  "mandatory": false
},
{
 "name": "excludedSysIds",
  "label": "excludedSysIds",
  "description": "Rows that were excluded after all rows were selected",
  "readOnly": false,
  "fieldType": "string",
  "mandatory": false
}]
